Articles.Content:
It's not the prettiest craft out there, but it still looks cool! Made it completely by myself, (but might have borrowed some ideas from the Soundwave, full credit for hidden intake idea goes to him). only 91 (90 plus one extra useless strut I can't find) parts, and it still looks good, and performs good.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/EvDwO)

DL: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/f9jdk4b4l8djue8/F22.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/f9jdk4b4l8djue8/F22.craft?dl=0)

Edit: Inserted album properly

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T20:43:17Z" title="07/26/2015 08:43  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by TronX33**

To get the album in try [imgur]EvDwO[/imgurt] (but with imgur spelt right)

Nice craft, looks really clean and sleek.

Hi Engineer!

To insert an Imgur Album, type [noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/YOUR)

[/noparse]
looks cool!

> 
> To get the album in try [imgur]EvDwO[/imgurt] (but with imgur spelt right)
> Nice craft, looks really clean and sleek.

 Thanks for the info! It's really not as good as say, marex33's crafts, but I wanted it to be low part count, and I'm glad it still looks good to you!

- - - Updated - - 

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Hi Engineer!
> To insert an Imgur Album, type [noparse][http://imgur.com/a/YOUR ALBUM CODE HERE](http://imgur.com/a/YOUR)[/noparse]
> 
> looks cool!

I'm glad it looks good, I tried to make it look cool, and like the real one. Not as smooth as other builds I've found, but I believe this is one of the few built for 1.04.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T21:18:51Z" title="07/26/2015 09:18  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by TronX33**
